brief_summary.textblock:
Although arginine vasopressin has been used as an additional drug in refractory shock in
      worldwide clinical practice, there are no prospective studies using it as a first choice
      therapy in patients with cancer and septic shock.

      The aim of this study is assess if the use of arginine vasopressin would be more effective
      on treatment of septic shock in cancer patients than norepinephrine, decreasing the
      composite end point of mortality and organ failure in 28 days.

clinical_study.brief_title: Vasopressin Versus Norepinephrine for the Management of Septic Shock in Cancer Patients

intervention.description: Blinded Vasopressin will be started if there is persistent hypotension, characterized by mean arterial pressure <65 mmHg after fluid replacement
Blinded Norepinephrine will be started if there is persistent hypotension, characterized by mean arterial pressure <65 mmHg after fluid replacement

facility.name: Instituto do Cancer do Estado de Sao Paulo

clinical_study.official_title: Vasopressin Versus Norepinephrine for the Management of Septic Shock in Cancer Patients

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Anesthesia and Critical Care, Intensive Care Unit - ICESP

oversight_info.authority: Brazil: National Committee of Ethics in Research

primary_outcome.description: Mortality from all causes in 28-day follow-up

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014

secondary_outcome.description: Mortality from all causes 90 days after randomization
Days alive and free of mechanical ventilation at 28-day follow-up

secondary_outcome.description: Days alive and free of any type of vasopressor agent at 28-day follow-up
secondary_outcome.measure: Days alive and free of vasopressors

secondary_outcome.description: requirement of dialysis of hemofiltration at 28-day follow-up
secondary_outcome.measure: Days alive and free of renal replacement therapy

secondary_outcome.description: Days alive and free of organ failure according the sequential organ failure assessment (SOFA)
secondary_outcome.measure: Days alive and free of organ failure

secondary_outcome.description: Days alive and free of organ failure according to sequential organ failure assessment (SOFA)
secondary_outcome.measure: Days alive and free of organ failure
